project_descr: Bridging the digital gap in deprived communities through information communication technology. Empower underserved communities with access to information and data for decision making and planning

outputs.output_descr: Information communication technology as a tool for wealth creation, information management and education made more accessible to ten selected deprived communities across the country

project_title: information communication technology centres of learning
